featuredMods.name: Vanilla Content Expansion
featuredMods.author: KV Productions
featuredMods.description: This mod adds a variety of new vanilla-style content to Brick Rigs, including new bricks, weapons, and vehicles that fit seamlessly with the base game's aesthetic. Experience enhanced gameplay with carefully crafted additions that maintain the original game's charm while expanding your creative possibilities.
features: Advanced weapon systems with realistic ballistics
Enhanced vehicle parts including engines and transmissions

featuredMods.name: Advanced Physics Engine
featuredMods.author: PhysicsMaster
featuredMods.description: Revolutionize your Brick Rigs experience with this comprehensive physics overhaul. Featuring realistic collision detection, improved vehicle dynamics, and spectacular destruction effects that bring your creations to life like never before.

Authentic sound effects and visual effects
